Translations.Text: they non know ut DEUS knows everything they conceal everything they declare
Among them est gentiles non know scripture hearsay tunc assume ut they know it
Ergo woe to those distort scripture their suus manus tunc dictus Hoc est quod DEUS revealed seeking cheap material gain Woe to them pro such distortion woe to them pro their illicit gains
Some dictus Hell non touch nos limited numerus feria. Dictus Habet vos taken such pledge DEUS! - DEUS NUNQUAM breaks His pledge - Vos dictus DEUS quod vos non know
Indeed those earn sins become surrounded their malus work est dwellers Hell; they abide it forever
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita they est dwellers Paradise; they abide it forever

Nos factus covenant Infans Israel Vos non worship DEUS. Vos honor tuus parentes regard relatives orphanus poor Vos treat people amicably. Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat.) vos turned absque ut few de vos vos became averse
